item.title: Vote2 command
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:15, topic:368166”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=464313.msg3396395#msg3396395 date=1289433090]
Haha, you’re fucking retarded kid, I’m telling you to stack it up like I have it.

The way you have it is all retarded like:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) {c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000);                        }

[/quote]

It performs the same damn function, even when bunched up. /facepalm

You are using emulous or PI correct?
You must have added the command under the if(playerRights >= 2) statement, add it above that.[/quote]
The easiest way to get errors/something’s wrong is when it’s all bunched up like that.

Read full topic

You are using emulous or PI correct?

item.title: Vote2 command

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Should have followed my tutorial, unless you did. And if you did, then you didn’t read.

                        if(playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) {
c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000);
                        }

Tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461508.0.html

item.title: Vote2 command
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

if (playerCommand.equals(“vote2”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.getPA().sendFrame126(“www.runelocus.com/toplist/index.php?action=vote&id=3912”, 12000);
}
}

Pi source
317

can some 1 fix this… it works for owner and i type ::vote2 and it sends to everyone

how can i make it so normal players type ::vote2 and it opens up the vote thing to only there screen
cuz when i type ::vote2 it sends to everyone on the server!
pleas ehelp

Read full topic
